event.head: Preliminary survey of the site (and its surroundings): Where to fly and what to avoid.
event.desc: A preliminary survey is required, in order to understand the site and its surroundings. Due to flight regulament constrains it is important to check with local and national authorities if it is possible to fly drones over the area, and obtain the necessary permits (this may require some times, from weeks up to months, depending from country to country). It is also important to check for near natural or artificial obstacles that will influence the design of the drone's path.
